channel.title: Orange-scape v2.3 first time i release
channel.description:
first time i release one of my servers :D i make it from frostiescape pvp source so i thanks the makers of frostie for his server. i coded much things :D new things: better pk shop new prices dds dclaws ags deco sword give more hits ranged dont fails more :D and much more.
commands owner command. ::xteleto (name) you tele to somebody ::xteletome (name) tele somebody to you ::xtelealltome tele all to you ::uber ppl cant attack you ::pickup (item id) (amount) ::jail (name) jails somebody ::unjail (name) unjails somebody admins. same as mod and owner only no pickup and uber mod, ::mute (name) mutes somebody ::jail (name) jail somsbody ::unjail (name) unjail somebody normal players. ::master everybody can do that all skills 99 :) ::cash you get 1 gp XD for fun
the download link is [url=http://www.mediafire.com/file/p52m6zfxo4y2a2j/orange-scape%20server.zip]http://www.mediafire.com/file/p52m6zfxo4y2a2j/orange-scape%20server.zip[/url], hope you like it.
i don't know how i need put pics in this topic if somebody can say how i need to do that i put pics :). so u can only check it if you download srry. [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?sb277i6km1e44rq]http://www.mediafire.com/?sb277i6km1e44rq[/url] there is no virus if you dont belive check the screen of tinyscape ;) ty tinyscape for the screen

item.title: Orange-scape v2.3 first time i release
item.dc:creator: @TheCyberMan TheCyberMan
item.description:
@TheCyberMan wrote:

I recommend you translate what you want to say like in www.translate.google.com because people are bitches about English on these forums. Also, people require photos or they will flame.

On Topic: I recommend adding more than just commands and/or fixing stuff to the server

Read full topic

Also “kill you704”, you need to cool it with the language, some members on this forum don’t want to hear things like that.
